data.title: James Cameron: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: James Cameron: Check out the list of all James Cameron movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest James Cameron news on Times of India.
data.text:
James Cameron clarifies Michelle Yeoh's role in upcoming Avatar films

etimes.in / Aug 14, 2024, 12:34 (IST)

​In a recent interview, Cameron explained that the confusion arose from earlier reports about Yeoh's involvement. He stated, "Michelle Yeoh won’t be in [Avatar 3]. She’s in [Avatar 4] and [Avatar 5]. So, that got a little bit misreported. She will be coming in soon to do her part, which is an interesting, fun character."

Harrison Ford, Miley Cyrus, Angela Bassett, James Cameron and more honoured as Disney Legends

AP / Aug 12, 2024, 16:05 (IST)

Disney honored 14 artists, including Harrison Ford, Angela Bassett, and Miley Cyrus, with 'Legends' status for their significant impact on the company. The ceremony at Anaheim's Honda Center during the D23 convention was hosted by Ryan Seacrest and will be available on Disney+. Ford, Cyrus, and Bassett expressed gratitude and shared emotional moments during their acceptance speeches.

Disneyland to unveil new pandora-themed land inspired by ‘Avatar: The Way of Water’

etimes.in / Aug 12, 2024, 14:14 (IST)

The new attraction at Disneyland in Anaheim will be inspired by James Cameron’s 2022 film Avatar: The Way of Water, as well as future films in the Avatar series. This new land will offer guests a chance to explore the breathtaking landscapes and exciting adventures of Pandora, a stark contrast to the existing Pandora-themed area at Disney World’s Animal Kingdom in Orlando, Florida, which is based on the original 2009 Avatar movie.

Avatar 3: What the title 'Fire and Ash' Reveals About the Next Chapter Of This James Cameron movie

etimes.in / Aug 10, 2024, 12:36 (IST)

James Cameron has been sharing teasers about what to expect in Fire and Ash. According to him, the movie will explore new areas of Pandora, showcasing unfamiliar settings, cultures, and creatures. He hinted that the film would surprise audiences while still delivering what they desire. Although there was no footage presented at the recent D23 Entertainment Showcase, Cameron offered a glimpse of what's to come through concept art.

Avatar 3: James Cameron announces official title 'Fire and Ash', confirms December release

etimes.in / Aug 10, 2024, 10:54 (IST)

James Cameron's latest film, Avatar: Fire and Ash, announced at the D23 Expo, is set to release on December 19, 2025. This sequel to Avatar: The Way of Water will explore new aspects of Pandora with higher emotional stakes.

Throwback: When Govinda reacted to netizens' disbelief over his Avatar claims: ‘It’s not like meri aukat nahi hai’

etimes.in / Aug 04, 2024, 15:11 (IST)

Following his assertion that director James Cameron offered him the lead part in ‘Avatar’, Govinda responded to all of the jokes and memes that were made about him on social media.

Trailer for SS Rajamouli's documentary 'Modern Masters' is OUT

etimes.in / Jul 22, 2024, 12:40 (IST)

The trailer for 'Modern Masters: SS Rajamouli,' a documentary directed by Raghav Khanna, was released today, July 22. Set to premiere on August 2, this documentary is about the career of acclaimed filmmaker SS Rajamouli, showcasing his dedication, storytelling prowess, and behind-the-scenes insights from his work on 'Baahubali' and 'RRR.'

Pahlaj Nihalani clarifies Govinda's claims about 'Avatar' offer; Says, 'The actor got confused it with an unfinished Hindi film project'

etimes.in / Jul 16, 2024, 14:09 (IST)

​Producer and former CBFC chief Pahlaj Nihalani has clarified recent claims made by actor Govinda regarding James Cameron’s blockbuster film, 'Avatar.' According to Nihalani, Govinda was mistaken in his assertion about being offered a role in the Hollywood film. Instead, Nihalani explained that 'Avatar' was a Hindi film project they were developing together, which unfortunately remained incomplete. In an interview Nihalani recounted their collaboration on a film titled Avatar, where they had shot about 40 minutes of footage.

Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Sam Worthington mourn 'Titanic' and 'Avatar' producer Jon Landau's demise; pay touching tribute

etimes.in / Jul 08, 2024, 08:22 (IST)

Oscar-winning 'Titanic' and 'Avatar' producer Jon Landau died at 63 in Los Angeles. Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, and Sam Worthington paid their heartfelt tributes to the producer and remembered him for his legacy of kindness, strength, and compassion. Landau's demise was confirmed by his son, Jamie Landau. He died on Friday in Los Angeles, though no cause was revealed.

James Cameron pays a heartfelt tribute to 'Avatar' producer Jon Landau: A part of myself has been torn away

etimes.in / Jul 07, 2024, 11:03 (IST)

James Cameron mourns Jon Landau, 63, who died on July 5 from cancer. Landau, who collaborated with Cameron for 31 years, started at 20th Century Fox before joining Lightstorm Entertainment, producing 'Titanic' and 'Avatar'.

'Titanic' and 'Avatar' producer Jon Landau passes away at 63 after a long battle with cancer

etimes.in / Jul 07, 2024, 10:33 (IST)

Jon Landau, 63, producer and COO of James Cameron’s Lightstorm Entertainment, passed on July 5. Born in New York, he produced 'Titanic', 'Avatar', 'Avatar: The Way of Water' and 'Alita: Battle Angel' At Fox, he worked on 'True Lies' before joining Cameron in 1995. He also developed Pandora – The World of Avatar and Cirque du Soleil’s 'Toruk'.

'Avatar' actor Joel David Moore shares an update on filming for future sequels

etimes.in / Jul 04, 2024, 15:51 (IST)

​Joel David Moore's latest Instagram post has sparked enthusiasm for the return of the Avatar franchise. Recognized for his role as Norm Spellman in the first two films, Moore offered glimpses from the set in New Zealand, hinting at his continued involvement in the eagerly awaited sequel. These updates come amidst his reflections on his involvement in the series, spanning from the original 2009 Avatar to the upcoming Avatar 4, currently in filming stages

Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio STRUGGLED to film iconic Titanic kissing scene - Here's Why

etimes.in / Jul 02, 2024, 14:23 (IST)

Kate Winslet shared challenges faced during the filming of 'Titanic', including the difficulties of reshooting the iconic kissing scene with Leonardo DiCaprio. The film went on to win multiple Oscars and remains a top-earning movie globally.

Roger Corman, Hollywood mentor and 'King of the Bs,' dies at 98

AP / May 13, 2024, 03:53 (IST)

Roger Corman, the iconic filmmaker known for his low-budget classics and launching the careers of Hollywood's biggest names, has died at the age of 95 in Santa Monica, California. Corman's legacy in cinema and his impact on the industry will be remembered for generations to come.

Iconic 'Titanic' door sells for THIS much at Planet Hollywood auction

Mar 28, 2024, 16:48 (IST)

The Titanic door has sparked controversy among fans over the years, with many arguing that there was enough space for both Rose and Jack to survive if they had shared it. Director James Cameron even made a documentary addressing this debate, suggesting that it was indeed possible for both characters to fit on the door.

'Naatu Naatu' song from 'RRR' makes a surprise appearance at Oscars 2024

etimes.in / Mar 11, 2024, 12:38 (IST)

Jr NTR and Ram Charan's song 'Naatu Naatu' from 'RRR' made a surprise appearance at Oscars 2024, adding an Indian touch to the event. Winning an Oscar for the best original song in 2023, the song's cameo highlighted its impact. Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connel won the Best Original Song award this year in 2024.

Will SS Rajamouli and Mahesh Babu's 'SSMB29' have an international director during its launch event?

Feb 26, 2024, 15:19 (IST)

Mahesh Babu's much-awaited film, 'SSMB29,' directed by SS Rajamouli, has been generating immense buzz among fans and industry insiders alike. There have been speculations that launch event of the film might have the presence some of the renowned directors of Hollywood and collaboration with foreign media. The movie is currently in its pre-production phase.
